| dykdate = 12 June 2011 | dykentry =... that the Brazilian government's order for [[dreadnought]] [[battleship]]s ''(one pictured)'' led to a [[South American dreadnought race|'''South American naval arms race''']]? |currentstatus=FA }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPMILHIST|class=FA|A-Class=pass|Maritime=yes|South-American=yes|OMT=3|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y}} {{WikiProject Ships|class=FA}} {{WikiProject Latin America|class=FA|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Brazil|class=FA|importance=mid|history=yes}} {{WikiProject Argentina|class=FA|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Chile|class=FA|importance=low|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y|b6=y}} }} {{OnThisDay|date1=2012-04-17|oldid1=487918371|date2=2014-04-17|oldid2=604404092|date3=2015-04-17|oldid3=656568598|date4=2016-04-17|oldid4=715350775}}
== Biblioteca.dphdm.mar.mil.br (now sistemas.dphdm.mar.mil.br) == The links to ''Minas Geraes''{{'}} ship history and images as given on [http://biblioteca.dphdm.mar.mil.br/internet/navios/Index.asp?codNavio=368 the linked reference] is wrong as of this message. The history is actually located [http://biblioteca.dphdm.mar.mil.br/internet/navios/Documentos\MINAS_GERAIS_I.DOC here] in .doc format. The two images have been uploaded to the [[Wikimedia Commons]] as [[:File:Minas Geraes MdB.JPG]] and [[:File:Minas Geraes MdB 2.JPG]], and the correct links on the navy's website are [http://biblioteca.dphdm.mar.mil.br/internet/navios/imagensNavios/MINAS-GERAIS.JPG here] and [http://biblioteca.dphdm.mar.mil.br/internet/navios/imagensNavios/MINAS-GERAIS-I-2.JPG here]. [[User:The ed17|Ed]] <sup>[[User talk:The ed17|[talk]]] [[WP:OMT|[majestic titan]]]</sup> 11:19, 22 August 2012 (UTC) :''Histórico de Navios'' frequently goes down for extended periods of time—as of this message, it has been offline for several weeks. Those needing a copy of any of the documents on ''Histórico de Navios'' that are referenced in this article may feel free to email me using Wikipedia's [[Special:EmailUser/The_ed17|email user]] function, and I will be happy to help. [[User:The ed17|Ed]] <sup>[[User talk:The ed17|[talk]]] [[WP:OMT|[majestic titan]]]</sup> 17:56, 23 March 2013 (UTC) :Confirming again that the site is still giving an error message. [[User:The ed17|Ed]] <sup>[[User talk:The ed17|[talk]]] [[WP:OMT|[majestic titan]]]</sup> 22:07, 8 April 2014 (UTC) :Noting that the two images and some of the referenced webpages (but not the docs) are archived [http://www.archive.today/biblioteca.dphdm.mar.mil.br here]. [[User:The ed17|Ed]] <sup>[[User talk:The ed17|[talk]]] [[WP:OMT|[majestic titan]]]</sup> 00:45, 16 July 2014 (UTC) ::The site is now available [http://www.sistemas.dphdm.mar.mil.br/navios/Cons.asp here]. URLs should be altered by replacing "biblioteca" with "sistemas" and removing /internet. [[User:The ed17|Ed]] <sup>[[User talk:The ed17|[talk]]] [[WP:OMT|[majestic titan]]]</sup> 07:09, 26 January 2015 (UTC) :::And as of this message, the site is now down once again. I have not found a replacement. [[User:The ed17|Ed]] <sup>[[User talk:The ed17|[talk]]] [[WP:OMT|[majestic titan]]]</sup> 01:36, 18 February 2016 (UTC) ::::It is now available again. [[User:The ed17|Ed]] <sup>[[User talk:The ed17|[talk]]] [[WP:OMT|[majestic titan]]]</sup> 00:40, 31 March 2016 (UTC)
